pages.title: Collecting Fumes
pages.text: The $(item)Witches Oven$() gives a practitioner of the art the opportunity to collect the fumes that may be produced when cooking.$(2br)Remember that the oven cannot smelt $(item)ore$(), but it does cook a little faster than a $(item)furnace$().

pages.title: Collecting Fumes
pages.text: Place $(item)Clay Jars$() into the oven when cooking to collect the fumes:$(p)Food  $(6)Foul Fume$()$(br)Wood  $(6)Foul Fume$()$(p)Cooking $(item)Saplings$() produces $(item)Wood Ash$() and may also release the gaseous essence of the tree.

pages.title: Sapling Fumes
pages.text: Most other items can be smelted in the oven and will produce $(item)Foul Fume$().
